full_output.summary: Dedicated and innovative aspiring Software Engineer with a strong foundation in designing and developing scalable web applications and software solutions. Skilled in low-level design, OOP, schema design, DSA in Java, Python, JavaScript, SQL, and data analysis with NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib. Passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex challenges.

certifications.title: The Complete 2023 Web Development Internship Training on MERN Stack

education.school: Sri Chaitanya Boys College Aarya Bhavan

projects.name: Food Ordering Application using the MERN stack
projects.description: Developed 'LovelyTastes,' a Food Ordering Application using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Designed a responsive, user-friendly interface, ensuring seamless order management and enhancing user experience. Deployed on a cloud platform for scalability.

projects.name: Hotel Dataset Analysis and Visualization using Python Libraries
projects.description: Conducted data analysis on a hotel dataset to derive meaningful insights for business decisions. Cleaned and processed data, performed statistical analysis and visualised data to identify trends and opportunities for improvement.

experiences.description: Collaborated with the development team to understand and implement user interface components using react.JS. Back end Development using node.JS and express.JS, and building a rest full API to facilitate communication between the frontend and the backend. Database Management with MongoDB, work on designing and maintaining MongoDB databases. Write queries and perform data manipulation to ensure efficient data storage and retrieval.
